@tuyennhv  I've tracked the issue to incorrect ordering of attestation duties. The problem is that getCommitteeAssignments() returns un-ordered duties while the api impl code assumes it does. This makes the validator client apply duties to wrong validator and sign with a different key

The issue is fixed with this commit https://github.com/ChainSafe/lodestar/pull/3046/commits/e53647ea4e053f0c98a7c2506b79a61e4c831b9d
